alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 3:18PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Arizona, including the following county, Gila. * WHEN...Until 900 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding on Tonto Creek through Tonto Basin. Unbridged crossings not safe to pass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 316 PM MST, a streamflow gauge on Tonto Creek, upstream from Tonto Basin, measured 4.7 feet as of 3 pm Thursday. Unbridged crossings in Tonto Basin, including A Crossing, Bar X Crossing, Greenback Crossing, and Store Crossing are not safe to pass with this type of flow. Flooding will persist into this weekend due to continued snow melt. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tonto Basin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
